title: GS Blockchain
author: GS Blockchain
content: Recently, Multicoin Capital has been actively interacting with Genesis, Multicoin Capital express that they will choose a promising market before investing which regard as Genesis accurately meets their goals and is unique in the commercial field in the Public blockchains.Founded in Austin, Texas in 2017, Multicoin Capital as one of the most successful investment institutions in the venture capital industry, foucus on investing in crpptocurrencies, blockchain tokens and early blockchain projects. The representative investment cases include Solana, Helium, The Graph and etc.
